name: Matter

commands.description: Search for a kudos type, e.g., 'Thank you' or 'Amazing job'

parameters.description: See available kudos types or filter by a specific kudos type
parameters.name: type
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a kudos type like 'Thank you' or 'Amazing job' or 'all' to see all kudos types. Returns kudos type list, not kudos given by users.
parameters.title: Kudos type

parameters.description: Return kudos given or received by user or whole team
parameters.name: kudosSent
parameters.semanticDescription: Returns a list of kudos given or received. When used with type parameter, filters kudos by type
parameters.title: Kudos given or received

parameters.description: Filter kudos by date range
parameters.name: dateFilter
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter colon separated from/to dates in format YYYY-MM-DD:YYYY-MM-DD to filter kudos by date
parameters.title: Kudos given/received by date

parameters.description: Filter kudos by giver or receiver name
parameters.name: person
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter 'giver' or 'receiver' followed by ':' and name/email of giver/receiver ex 'giver:John Doe' or 'receiver:dmitry@a.com
parameters.title: Kudos by giver/receiver name

parameters.description: See top kudos givers and receivers
parameters.name: leaderboard
parameters.semanticDescription: Generate a leaderboard of kudos givers and receivers, pass along 'type' parameter to filter by kudos type
parameters.title: Generate kudos leaderboard

samplePrompts.text: Matter show me kudos given by John Doe
Matter generate a leaderboard of top kudos givers and receivers

commands.semanticDescription: Search for a kudos type, see kudos given or received by user or whole team or generate kudos leaderboard
commands.title: Kudos

commands.description: Search for a coin balances of a user or whole team

parameters.description: Enter a user name or email to see coin balance of a user
parameters.name: user
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a user name or email to see coin balance of a user, unredeemed coins and coins spent
parameters.title: Coin Balance of a user

parameters.description: Enter a team name to see coin balance, unredeemed coins and coins spent of whole team
parameters.name: team
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a team name to see coin balance, unredeemed coins and coins spent of whole team
parameters.title: Coin Balance of whole team

parameters.description: See coin reset date for a team
parameters.name: resetDate
parameters.semanticDescription: Pass 'true' to return next coin reset date for a team
parameters.title: Coin reset date

samplePrompts.text: Matter Show me my coin balance
Matter Show me a coin balance of my team
Matter When is the next coin reset date for my team?

commands.semanticDescription: Search for a coin balances of a user or whole team, see unredeemed coins and coins reset date for a team
commands.title: Coins

commands.description: Search for a reward or user's reward redemption history

parameters.description: Enter a reward name to filter by reward title or brand
parameters.name: title
parameters.semanticDescription: Returns a description of the reward, its brand and cost in coins, not reward requests
parameters.title: Reward title

parameters.description: Filter users reward requests by status
parameters.name: status
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter request status (pending, approved, rejected or all) to see reward requests by status
parameters.title: Get reward requests by status

parameters.description: Filter reward requests by team name or id
parameters.name: team
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter team name, id or 'all' to see reward requests by team
parameters.title: Get reward requests by team

parameters.description: Filter reward requests by user name or email
parameters.name: user
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a user name or email or 'all' to see reward requests history, for my requests enter 'my'
parameters.title: See reward requests by user

parameters.description: Filter reward requests by date range
parameters.name: dateFilter
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a colon separated from/to dates in format YYYY-MM-DD to filter reward requests history
parameters.title: Reward requests history filter

samplePrompts.text: Matter show me pending reward requests
Matter show me reward requests by team
Matter show me all reward titles

commands.semanticDescription: Search for a reward or user's reward redemption history, see reward requests by status, team, user or date range
commands.title: Rewards

commands.description: Search for birthdays and work anniversaries

parameters.description: Celebrations happening in a specific month
parameters.name: month
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a month to filter celebrations by month, e.g., 'January'
parameters.title: Search by month

parameters.description: filter celebrations by date range
parameters.name: dateFilter
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a colon separated range (from:to) in format YYYY-MM-DD to filter celebrations by date range
parameters.title: Search by date range

parameters.description: See who didn't add celebration dates
parameters.name: missing
parameters.semanticDescription: Pass 'birthdays' or 'anniversaries' or 'all' to see users with no celebrations
parameters.title: Users with no celebrations

samplePrompts.text: Matter show me users with no birthdays
Matter show me users with no anniversaries
Matter show me this month‚Äôs celebrations

commands.semanticDescription: Search for birthdays and work anniversaries, see celebrations by month, date range or users with no celebrations
commands.title: Celebrations

commands.description: Search for surveys, survey results and analytics

parameters.description: Show survey results by survey name, eg 'Survey 1' or 'Pulse'
parameters.name: name
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a survey name to see survey results, for pulse survey results enter 'pulse' or 'eNPS' to see eNPS score
parameters.title: Survey results

parameters.description: Filter survey results by date range
parameters.name: dateFilter
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a colon separated range (from:to) in format YYYY-MM-DD to filter survey responses by date range
parameters.title: Search by date range

parameters.description: filter survey results by team name or id
parameters.name: team
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter team name, id or 'all' to see survey results by team
parameters.title: Get survey results by team

parameters.description: Filter survey results by user name or email
parameters.name: user
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a user name or email or 'all' to see survey results per user.
parameters.title: See individual responses

samplePrompts.text: Matter Show me results for the last pulse survey
Matter what are the biggest areas of improvement based on the pulse survey results
Matter What is my current eNPS score?

commands.semanticDescription: Search for surveys, survey results and analytics, see survey results by survey name, date range, team or user
commands.title: Surveys

commands.description: Give Kudos to a team member

parameters.description: Receiver name or email
parameters.name: giveTo
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a user name or email to give kudos to
parameters.title: Give to

parameters.description: Select kudos type
parameters.name: type
parameters.semanticDescription: Available kudos type from your company list ex 'Thank you' or 'Amazing job'
parameters.title: Kudos type

parameters.description: Kudos message
parameters.name: message
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a message to give kudos, 300 characters max
parameters.title: Kudos message

parameters.description: Add coins to the kudos
parameters.name: coins
parameters.semanticDescription: Enter a number of coins to give with kudos, the amount can't exceed your balance
parameters.title: Add coins

parameters.description: Select visibility of kudos
parameters.name: visibility
parameters.semanticDescription: Public kudos are visible to everyone, private kudos are visible only to the giver and receiver and are sent via DM
parameters.title: Visibility

commands.semanticDescription: Give Kudos to a team member by selecting a kudos type, adding a message and coins
commands.title: Give Kudos

longDescription:
Increase employee engagement with peer-to-peer kudos recognition based on company values, save time by automating global gift card delivery and birthdays/anniversaries, and 10x your response rate with pulse and custom surveys.

**What you can do with Matter:**

- üéâ¬†**Start Feedback Friday**!¬†‚Äî Automatic, customizable notifications centered around a day where your company is encouraged to give peer-to-peer recognition with kudos and feedback.

- üôå¬†**Celebrate wins together with Kudos**! ‚Äî Choose from 9 templates or create your own custom kudos to share company values, company jokes, and more. 

- üéÅ¬†**Increase recognition with Rewards**! ‚Äî Add Matter coins to kudos, surveys, and feedback to show extra appreciation. Redeem coins for gift cards, custom company rewards, donations, and more.

- ü•≥¬†**Never miss a Celebration**! ‚Äî Automatically send birthday and work anniversary messages with/without rewards for everyone to see and celebrate.

- üìã¬†**10x your response rate with Custom Surveys**! ‚Äî Automate and send surveys, get real-time feedback, view powerful analytics, and offer rewards.

- üìà¬†**Gather feedback with Pulse + eNPS Surveys**! ‚Äî Transform your organization into a champion of diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging. Gather real-time, continuous feedback and insights.

- üé®¬†**Put Company Values front and center**! ‚Äî Make people feel more connected to the company and each other with company value kudos templates.

- üìä¬†**Answer culture questions with Analytics**! ‚Äî Leverage kudos, rewards, and feedback activity to identify engagement insights and trends.

**Use Matter with Microsoft 365 Copilot:**

Matter has integrations with Microsoft Teams, Outlook, and now Copilot, which helps teams leverage simple, natural language prompts to get where they want to go, faster. Try these prompts:

- "Matter, generate a leaderboard of top kudos givers and receivers."

- "Matter, what celebrations are coming next month?"

- "Matter, what is my company's current eNPS."

**What companies are saying about Matter:**

- "Our company‚Äôs culture & morale changed overnight! In under 2 months, we‚Äôve had over 2,000 kudos sent and 80%+ engagement across all employees. Matter has motivated people to participate like no other software we have ever used." ‚Äî Jeff Hagel, President | [Customer Story](https://matterapp.com/customer-stories/mcinnis-holloway?utm_source=microsoft-teams&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=partner-center)

- "I love how easy it is for employees to recognize each other with kudos. Matter has boosted morale, increased employee engagement, and it's now a strong presence in our company culture." ‚Äî Michael Margolese, Senior Human Resources Manager | [Customer Story](https://matterapp.com/customer-stories/trend-hunter?utm_source=microsoft-teams&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=partner-center)

- "Matter helps our employees feel more valued, rewarded, and recognized. It‚Äôs a very fun and easy-to-use platform that has created a positive experience and engagement for our people while also helping to reinforce our core values daily." ‚Äî Taylor Rapp, Director of People & Culture | [Customer Story](https://matterapp.com/customer-stories/true-classic?utm_source=microsoft-teams&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=partner-center)

**Get Started:**

- [Try Matter for Free](https://matterapp.com/?utm_source=teams-app-directory&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=bio)! ‚Äî *Matter has a 14-day free trial with unlimited access to all features.*

- Want more info? Watch the [Matter demo video](https://matterapp.com/demo?utm_source=teams-app-directory&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=bio) or [schedule a demo](https://schedule.matterapp.com/campaign/demo?utm_source=teams-app-directory&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=partner-center).

**Have Questions or Feedback?**

Email us at [hello@matterapp.com](mailto:hello@matterapp.com) or message us at [@MatterApp](https://twitter.com/MatterApp).

Matter supports Microsoft Teams and Outlook.
shortDescription: Employee Recognition, Rewards, Surveys, and Celebrations where you work!

examplePrompts.prompt: @Matter Can you help me understand how to send a recognition to a colleague?
examplePrompts.description: User is asking for assistance in sending a recognition to a colleague using the bot.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Matter I need assistance on how to create a survey for employee feedback.
examplePrompts.description: User is seeking guidance on creating a survey to gather employee feedback.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Matter How do I set up a celebration event for a team member's work anniversary?
examplePrompts.description: User is looking for instructions on setting up a celebration event for a colleague's work anniversary.
